main event: A witness observed a bright, round object in the sky for about fifteen minutes on June 26, 1957.
interesting points: The witness reported seeing the object appear to be round, bright, and spinning,The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds,The object shot straight up into the sky and disappeared quickly,Witness described the object as not feeling like an airplane or anything conventional,In a separate incident on July 7, 1957, objects were observed resembling bright stars and moving in a southwesterly direction.
sighted object: a bright round object in the sky
witness description: The witness stated they were an air mechanic from Dunlop Co.
